import React from 'react' import "./Header.css" import SearchIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Search'; import ShoppingBasketIcon from '@material-ui/icons/ShoppingBasket'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useStateValue } from './StateProvider'; import { auth } from './firebase'; function Header() { const [{ basket,user }, dispatch] = useStateValue(); const handleAuthentication = () =>{ if(user){ auth.signOut(); } } // console.log(user) return (
< SearchIcon className="header_searchIcon" />
Hello {!user ? 'Guest' : user.email} {user ? 'Signed In' : 'Sign Out'}
Returns & Orders
Your prime
{basket?.length}
) } export default Header
